contentrichtext.text: '''Calcahualco''' is a city in the [[Mexican state]] of [[Veracruz]]. It serves as the municipal seat for the [[Calcahualco (municipality)|surrounding municipality of the same name]]. The [[coffee]] grown in Calcahualco is famous. {{coord missing|Veracruz}} == External links == * {{es icon}} [http://www.calcahualco.gob.mx Municipal Official Site] * {{es icon}} [http://portal.veracruz.gob.mx/portal/page?_pageid=153,4493464&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL&municipio=calcahualco.pdf Municipal Official Information] [[Category:Populated places in Veracruz]] {{Veracruz-geo-stub}} {{Veracruz}}
